results.title: Australia - my chosen home
results.creator_credit: Vinh Nguyen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Vinh’s study trip to Australia in 1997 changed his life forever. Hanoi may have been the place of his childhood memories but Australia would turn out to be a part of his life - his true home.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Vinh Nguyen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Two lives
results.creator_credit: Duc Hoang Nguyen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Duc Hoang Nguyen remembers the bitter past of life in Vietnam during the war and a new found life of peace and freedom in Australia.

results.title: A Journey to freedom
results.creator_credit: Gia Binh Lieu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Escaping from Vietnam in 1988 to look for freedom, Gia Binh Lieu became a refugee and settled in Australia. His story is of family and disconnection, of survival and a better future.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gia Binh Lieu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Men's voices: Digital Storytelling project (Vietnamese men)
results.brief_description: Eleven digital stories of family separation, war and conflict, escape and new beginnings, created by a group of Vietnamese men who participated in the Mens Line Workshop held in Sydney from 5-8 November 2007.

results.title: Two hours of christmas cartoons
results.creator_credit: Hughes Leisure Group and Music World
results.brief_description: A compilation of cartoons from the forties and fifties which feature classic stories such as ‘Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer’, ‘Santa’s surprise’, ‘Jingle bell foolin’, ‘Christmas circus’ and a host of other titles guaranteed to generate lots of Christmas spirit.

results.title: Two hands [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Gregor Jordan, Marian MacGowan, CML and Meridian Films
results.brief_description: Set in Sydney’s King’s Cross, 19 year old Jimmy (Heath Ledger) finds himself in debt to a local gangster, Pando, played by perennial Australian actor Bryan Brown, when a simple job goes wrong. Jimmy’s life depends on his locating the $10,000 he has lost. As his scheme to replace the cash is played out, two street kids are enjoying a shopping spree with the original loot. The black humour of the film progressively darkens as the story unfolds. Rose Byrne co-stars as country girl, Alex, who becomes involved with Jimmy and his increasingly dire situation.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gregor Jordan, Marian MacGowan, CML and Meridian Films

Jimmy’s life depends on his locating the $10,000 he has lost. As his scheme to replace the cash is played out, two street kids are enjoying a shopping spree with the original loot. The black humour of the film progressively darkens as the story unfolds. Rose Byrne co-stars as country girl, Alex, who becomes involved with Jimmy and his increasingly dire situation.

results.title: Paper making
results.creator_credit: John Dobis, Sheridan Stumm and Discovery Video
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Tonia Todman’s craft room”.
Tonia Todman demonstrates how to make paper. She describes how to create interesting effects through the addition of grasses, seeds, flowers, and threads to your paper pulp. How to emboss or add a watermark to your paper is also explained. As well as recycling scrap paper, Tonia demonstrates how to produce paper from leaves and other natural products, and also from rags.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John Dobis, Sheridan Stumm and Discovery Video
